Detailed Description

template<typename VarArray, typename Val, typename ValCount>
struct NotOccurrenceEqualConstraint< VarArray, Val, ValCount >

constraints;occurrence Description The constraint

occurrence(vec, elem, count)

ensures that there are count occurrences of the value elem in the vector vec. constraints;occurrence Notes elem must be a constant, not a variable. constraints;occurrence References help constraints occurrenceleq help constraints occurrencegeq constraints;occurrenceleq Description The constraint

occurrenceleq(vec, elem, count)

ensures that there are AT MOST count occurrences of the value elem in the vector vec. constraints;occurrenceleq Notes elem and count must be constants constraints;occurrenceleq References help constraints occurrence help constraints occurrencegeq constraints;occurrencegeq Description The constraint

occurrencegeq(vec, elem, count)

ensures that there are AT LEAST count occurrences of the value elem in the vector vec. constraints;occurrencegeq Notes elem and count must be constants constraints;occurrencegeq References help constraints occurrence help constraints occurrenceleq

int NotOccurrenceEqualConstraint< VarArray, Val, ValCount >::dynamic_trigger_count (  )  [inline, virtual]

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

template<typename VarArray, typename Val, typename ValCount>
virtual triggerCollection NotOccurrenceEqualConstraint< VarArray, Val, ValCount >::setup_internal (  )  [inline, virtual]

Gets all the triggers a constraint wants to set up.

This function shouldn't do any propagation. That is full_propagate's job.

template<typename VarArray, typename Val, typename ValCount>
virtual bool NotOccurrenceEqualConstraint< VarArray, Val, ValCount >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.
